Name: Zoning, 350 Park Avenue, Manhattan (C 250197 ZSM).
Title: Application number C 250197 ZSM (350 Park Avenue) submitted by VNO 350 Park Development LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 81-645 of the Zoning Resolution to allow an increase in the amount of floor area ratio permitted on a qualifying site where an above-grade public concourse is provided, in connection with a proposed commercial building, on property located at 350 Park Avenue (Block 1287, Lots 21, 27, 28, and 33) in C5-3 and C5-2.5 Districts, within the Special Midtown District, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 5, Council District 4.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises

Attachments.Name: Calendar of the Zoning Subcommittee Meeting - August 20, 2025
